comment.author: 63589068@N04
comment._content:
You said: "Not sure how (or if) the StG/STG logo on their uniforms fits in..."   

GST - Girls Soccer Team?  I suspect it was an interaclub exhibition game - one team (this one) being the "Blue and White (Skirts)" the others being the "Bloomer Blues".
